properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,S.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,BOARD_TITLE ,USER_ID ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO=BOARD_WRITER) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE=1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) S) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO=? AND STATUS='Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,USER_ID ,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO=BOARD_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS ='Y'
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? ,BOARD_CONTENT = ? ,CATEGORY_NO = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,COUNT ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME THUMBNAIL FROM BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TYPE=2 AND FILE_LEVEL=1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT REPLY_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT ,USER_ID ,CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (REPLY_WRITER=USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS ='Y' AND REF_BNO = ?
